author: bnicholes
msg: NetWare makefile for building the test suite

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Allow dependencies to be generated by something other than GCC.
This allows Sun's cpp to generate valid .deps dependencies.
- Remove no longer used build/mkdep.sh (we haven't used this in a while)
- Do a run-time check in configure to determine our MKDEP program
(Unfortunately Forte's cc -E -M option doesn't work - must call cpp
- Switch the dependency generation to be executed for each file as not all

author: rbb
msg: Add a CuAssertStrnEquals which does a strncmp instead of a strcmp.  This

author: wrowe
msg: Based on Philip Martin's research, we need to ignore any d_type results
of DT_UNKNOWN from dirread, and just to be thorough, we will lstat() any
file where the inode was (0/-1) as undefined values, or type was not in
our mappable list based on DT_ flags.  This should resolve SVN's breakage.

author: bnicholes
msg: NetWare needs some defines that are in apr_private.h
